pages.text: Tse svyate pysannya ye vidkryte do vas - vy ne budete sumniv havani pro tse u vashomu sertsi - shcho vy mozhete poperedyty z tse, ta shchob zabezpechyty reminder dlya viruyuchiv
Vy budete vsi slidkuyete shcho vidkryvayetʹsya do vas z vashoho Lorda; ne proslidkuyte za budʹ-yakymy idolamy krim Yoho. Ridko robyty vy berete uvahu
Bahato spilʹnoty my vynyshchyly; vony zaznaly nashoho retribution v toy chas, yak vony spaly, abo shyrokyy probudyatʹ
Yikhniy vysliv koly nash retribution prybuv yim: "Diysno, my porushnyky
My zvychayno dopytayemo tsi khto otrymaly povidomlennya, ta my dopytayemo kur'yeriv
My poinformuyemo yikh avtorytetno, dlya my buly nikoly ne vidsutniy
vahy budutʹ napadatysya na shcho denʹ, equitably. Tsi chyyi tyahari ye vazhki budutʹ peremozhtsi
Yak dlya tsykh chyyikh tyahariv svitlo, vony budutʹ khto zahubyv yikhni dushi yak naslidok disregarding nashi vidkryttya, nespravedlyvo
My vstanovyly vas na zemli, ta my zabezpechyly dlya vas zasoby pidtrymky tam. Ridko vy appreciative
My utvoryly vas, todi my formleni vy, todi my skazaly anhelam, "Padayemo prostrate pered Adam." Vony upaly prostrate, krim Iblees (Satan); vin buv ne z prostrators
